title: Sacred Spirit - Bluesy Chill Out
description:
Sacred Spirit - Bluesy Chill Out
Original Release Date: September 2, 2003
Rip 320 kbs
Covers included

The twelve tracks flow into one another silkenly, and none are really adequately shown in the 30 second samples.
The crisp guitar, bluesy harmonica, soulful but spare vocals, tidal synthesizer, crisp rhythm, surprising flute,
and really lovely melody are just some of the layers in this virtuoso recording.
Fresh after many hearings, yet comfortable from the first time I heard it, this album works for me on every level.

01. Driftin&#039;    [0:05:11.12]

Enjoy It!!
Ulysses56
